title: Valkyrie 2008
description:
Valkyrie (2008) Tom Cruise DVDrip (Optional subs NORDIC+Eng)
aka
valkyrie 2008
  <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0985699/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0985699/</a>

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files (Work in Windows Media Player etc., see enclosed Note): Danish, Finnish, Norwegian, Swedish, English for the hearing impaired.

Tom Cruise as Colonel Claus von Stauffenberg, the German Army officer convinced he must save Germany from Hitler. The rental Nordic DVD is finally out, so I made a rip for you with available subtitles. 

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 704x368, great stereo sound AC3.
Runs well in both my standalone DivX players.

My ripping procedure now produces decent quality for such a long film compressed into just 700 MiB. I enclose a sample for ye weak in faith.
